thread.title: Trump Extends Lifeline to Sanctioned Tech Company ZTE - WSJ

author: Dan Strumpf
title: Trump Extends Lifeline to Sanctioned Tech Company ZTE - WSJ

organizations.name: trump extends lifeline to sanctioned tech company zte - wsj

text:
President Donald Trump said he was working with Chinese President Xi Jinping to keep ZTE Corp. in business, throwing an extraordinary lifeline to the stricken Chinese telecommunication giant that has been laid low by U.S. moves to cut off its suppliers.
The surprise intervention comes less than a month after ZTE was hit with an order banning U.S. companies from selling components to the Chinese firm. The U.S. Commerce Department directed companies to stop exporting to ZTE in mid-April, saying the Chinese firm violated the...
